dcterms:description: The dataset consists of Vietnamese legal documents used for tasks in the Automated Legal Question Answering Competition (ALQAC 2021), including legal text information retrieval, entailment prediction, and question answering.
dcterms:title: ALQAC 2021 Vietnamese Dataset

dcterms:creator: Chieu-Nguyen Chau
Truong-Son Nguyen
Le-Minh Nguyen
dcterms:description: VNLawBERT is a dataset used for Vietnamese legal answer selection, leveraging the BERT language model for improved performance in legal question answering tasks.
dcterms:title: VNLawBERT

dcterms:creator: Dat Quoc Nguyen
Anh Tuan Nguyen
dcterms:description: PhoBERT is a pre-trained language model for Vietnamese, which can be fine-tuned for various natural language processing tasks, including legal text processing.
dcterms:title: PhoBERT

dcterms:creator: Rabelo Juliano
Goebel Randy
Kano Yoshinobu
Kim Mi-Young
Yoshioka Masaharu
Satoh Ken
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of Thai legal documents used for tasks in the Automated Legal Question Answering Competition (ALQAC 2021), similar to the Vietnamese dataset but focused on Thai legal texts.
dcterms:title: ALQAC 2021 Thai Dataset
